title: Did An Anti-Sex Trafficking Internet Law Put Even More People At Risk?
description:
A law called FOSTA-SESTA, and its unintended consequences.

Featuring
Aja Romano 
Rep. Ro Khanna

Links to resources discussed:
RO KHANNA HOPES THIS BILL WILL PAVE THE WAY TO REPEALING FOSTA
The LGBTQ rights issue 2020 Democrats still aren’t talking about


Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:

Twitter: @Recode
